text: Break On Through (To the Other Side) is a popular song written and recorded by the American band The Doors. It is the opening track of their debut album, The Doors (1967). Elektra Records issued the song as the group's first single. == References == Category:1967 songs Category:Debut singles Category:The Doors songs Category:Psychedelic rock songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: Break On Through (To The Other Side)
